thread.title: Graham Price

author: Graham Price
title: Graham Price
text: The fitter was very friendly and knew more about the car than I did-always a good sign- and the installation of two front tyres ( on a Land Rover) took about an hour from start to finish. The price was excellent and the speed from initial order to fitting was also impressive. All in all , absolutely first class from start to finish!!
